text: E Iesusra ganam, an en nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn mɨngarim, egh an en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim damightɨ, a gɨn deraghvɨram otogham. Iesus fo, a bar deravɨra Godɨn akamɨn gɨn mangɨ egh a gɨn bar deravɨra ikɨva bar akuegh mamaghɨra ikiam. Egha a bizir kam gɨnɨghnɨgha egha gavgavigha ikia egha osɨmtɨziba atera ter ighuvimɨn ovenge. Gumazamiziba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, gumazir ter ighuvimɨn ovengezim, a bar gumazir arazir kurabagh amim, egha aghumsɨzir ekiam isi. Ezɨ Iesus aghumsɨzim gɨnɨghnɨzir puvatɨgha, egha areme. Egha datɨrɨghɨn a Godɨn agharir guvimɨn atrivir dabirabimɨn aperaghav iti.
